pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Shiny Dashboard Template System // A template system based on 'AdminLTE3' (https://adminlte.io/themes/v3/) theme. Comes with default theme that can be easily customized. Developers can upload modified templates on 'Github', and users can easily download templates with 'RStudio' project wizard. The key features of the default template include light and dark theme switcher, resizing graphs, synchronizing inputs across sessions, new notification system, fancy progress bars, and card-like flip panels with back sides, as well as various of 'HTML' tool widgets.
